      • addItemIdentifier

        public static String[] addItemIdentifier(Item item,
                         Version version)
        Retrieve an array of string where in first position there is the path builded from the dc.identifier (e.g. //authority/path where path is /handle/123456789/1), in second position founded the value of dc.identifier

        Returns:
